name: Slots of Dice
description:
*Reading the controls and rules is crucial to play the game

Slots of Dice is a dice turn-based combat game where you can re-roll dice as long as you roll 3 dice together. You can then use the dice to attack, defend, heal and conquer the enemy.

This game was part of a challenge my friend did against me. The idea is just basically GMTK Game Jam 2022. The only difference was that unlike our submission to the jam, we didn't do it together. Die in the Air is my game for the challenge while this is my friend's game for the challenge.

Controls: 

Click anywhere to begin

Click on the Up and Down buttons near the Red Dice to change the manipulating dice (the dice that is in the slot machine might be added to the manipulating dice)

Click the Red Dice to on and off the slot machine (There is going to be dots if you can re-roll dice and an X if you can't)

Click the White dice to do their skills or hover to see what they do (It's going to appear above)

Hover the tabs to find what the dice do. (A number before a White Dice is what will happen if you just use their skill and a number before a Red Dice is what will happen if you slot machine it)

Click next to end your turn and refill your White Dice deck

Rules:

If your HP is 0, you lose

If the enemy's HP is 0, you win

Shield blocks normal attacks then decreases

Pierce isn't affected by shield

Black bubbles near a character means that they have Poison for 2 turns

Red bubbles near a character means that they have Poison for 1 turn

Poison gives damage after the enemy and you are are done with your turn

Sleepy makes the slot machine not work and the enemy do less damage

Black Zs near a character means that they have Sleepy for 2 turns

Red Zs near a character means that they have Sleepy for 1 turn
